value: View of village and palm grove of Nkob in Morocco

Nkob is the capital village of the Berber Ait Atta tribe. The Ait Atta belongs to Confederation Ait Atta that are spread along Ouarzazate, Errachidia, and Azil Provinces.

The Amazigh Ait Atta are an ancient Berber tribe existent before Arab and Islam entrance in Morocco in the 7th century. The Ait Atta tribe were the most important Moroccan tribes between the 15th and the 19th century.

If you're looking to go deep into the Berber life of south Morocco, Nkob can be quite interesting and offers great experiences.

value: Way out of Nkob, direction Tazzarine in south Morocco.

Nkob village is located on the road between Ouarzazate and Tazzarine. This is the southern road to connect Marrakech and Erg Chebbi Dunes in Merzouga.
You can get a shared taxi from Ouarzazate to Nkob from the Central Bus Station (Gare Routiere d'Ouarzazate). 60 Dirhams per person. 8AM.
You can get a bus from Ouarzazate's Bus Station to Tansikht 40 Dirhams (4 Euros) and from here get a shared to Nkob 12 Dirhams per person 15 minutes ride.

value: Ichou le Berbere Excursions, Mountain Trekking in Morocco
Top view from inside Nkob village in Morocco
hours=Friday animal Market, Saturday and Sunday Market for local produce and all you can imagine
content=Nkob Market (souk) is the 2nd biggest of Zagora Province where many people from the region come to make business and shopping.
content=Nkob is surrounded by the Saghrou Mountains. These mountains offer great trekking opportunity and great wilderness.
content=Explore the immense Kasbahs inside the old village. If you have the chance try to enter one of the houses to see an upper view of the whole region.
directions=5 Days Dades Valley to Nkob Trekking
hours=Usually Excursions start 8AM from Taoudilt Dades or from Nkob Village)
price=400 Dirhams (40 Euros) per day / per person all included. Groups with more than 5 people price drops to 300 Dirhams (30 Euros) per person.
content=5 days Mountain trekking from the Dades Valley crossing the Saghrou Mountain all the way to Nkob village.

Don't miss the change to visit Nkob weekly market.

value: directions=Near supermarket Dohou and Restaurant Id Bab n'Ali
price=Price ranges from 120 Dirhams to 150 Dirhams for high quality hand made leather sandals
content=Theres one shop in Nkob named Ait Atta Shoes from Mr. Oufafa.
directions=Many shops on the main street of Nkob
price=henna powder costs 10 Dirhams for 200 grams

content=Moroccan best Henna comes from Nkob so if you're looking for prime quality henna powder this is the best place to get it. You can even buy it at local people's houses as many families have few hectares of henna plantations.
content=Nkob is nkown for great almonds organically grown.
content=Many shops on the main street sell local Berber women clothing and cosmetics.
address=La'aoun Street, 45702 Nkob, Zagora Region, Morocco
hours=Lunch time from 12PM to 3PM / Diner time from 8PM to 10PM
price=100 Dirhams (10 Euros) per person. Not more than 10 people. Booking in advance needed.
content=Eat traditional homemade food made in a real wooden fire. Great chance to taste authentic Berber cuisine made by Mrs. Fatima.

content=A very nice place where you can enjoy good tasteful tajines, couscous, brochettes, the typical berber soup and refreshing salads. Idir welcomes you with mint tea served on the terrace or in the garden.

content=Panaché is a usual Moroccan milk shake blending milk, sugar, apples, avocado and banana. This can be easily be changed to a non-dairy and no sugar smoothie if asked to do it with orange juice instead of milk. Depending the fruit season peach and strawberries can also be added. Ask for panaché special for an extra taste of dried grapes and almonds.
content=Most cafes will prepare you a avocado milk shake. This is probably one of Moroccans favorite milk shake.
Patio inside Hotel Kasbah Ennakhile in Nkob, Morocco.
name=Tigmi Nkob Chez l'Habitant Home Stay
address=La'aoun Street, 45702 Nkob, Zagora Region, Morocco
directions=This house is located right in the middle of the village, surrounded by old kasbahs.
price=300 Dirhams (30 Euros) Single Room + breakfast + diner / 500 Dirhams (50 Euros) Double Room + breakfast + diner
directions=The hotel is located right on the way out of Nkob direction Tazzarine.
price=300 Dirhams (30 Euros) Room in Kasbah (private bathroom) + Diner + Breakfast / 160 Dirhams (16 Euros) Room in Auberge (shared bathroom) + Diner + Breakfast
directions=Entrance of Nkob near Ziz Petrol Station
content=Camping car space available. Rooms and tents.
price=Single room 25 Euros / Double room 37 Euros / Triple room 50 Euros
content=Hotel built inside a traditional kasbah in center Nkob.
directions=In the village center near Tigmi Nkob Chez l'Habitant

content=Hotel Kasbah Riad du Sud is located in the village of Tamsahelte at about 10 kms from Tazzarine direction N'Kob and 20 kms from N'Kob. Coming from Ouarzazate or Zagora take the N12 at Tansikht direction N'Kob / Tazzarine. From N12 turn of to the village of Tamsahelte and when arriving at the first houses turn right up the hill. Although the road to the village is not paved, normal cars can easily drive through.
Mercedes Van - Shared Taxi in Nkob Morocco

Nkob village is located on the road between Ouarzazate and Tazzarine. This is the southern road to connect Marrakech and Erg Chebbi Dunes in Merzouga.

value: From Nkob to Merzouga in Erg Chebbi Dunes = 228KM
- Amazing orange colored dunes just 35km away from Erfoud
- The entrance town to Erg Chebbi Dunes, great town to buy goods before entering the open desert
- Desert town with a museum, Alaouite King Mausoleum and impressive center market
- Village on the edge of Erg Chebbi Dunes
- Region's capital with airport and other main government facilities
- Called the capital of the south, Ouarzazate makes the transition from Oases to Sahara Desert

You can get a shared taxi to Rissani from Tazzarine (and further more Merzouga) just a dozen kms away from Nkob. From Nkob to Tazzarine 25 minutes - 12 Dirhams. 4PM Bus from Tazzarine to Rissani around 40 Dirhams.
